sources.title: Shirin Neshat's Turbulent 1998 extract
sources.description: TURBULENT Directed by Shirin Neshat United States, 1998 Short 10 min. Synopsis On one wall, a singer delivers a passionate love song to a group of men. He is faced away from his audience, secure that his performance will be accepted and adored. On the opposite wall, a woman in a black chador stands silently throughout his song. Then something stunning happens…  Cast: Shoja Azari, Sussan Deyhim
